Hi,

I'd like to use JUnit 4.x with GWT, but I get the error shown below. I=

don't get this error if I use JUnit 3.x. I'm using command-line only,
and =
I created the ant build file with GWT's "projectCreator -ant
KitchenSink". =
I see other posts regarding JUnit 4.4, so it seems some
people have gotten =
this to work. How can I get around this "bad class
file" issue?  For easy r=
eference, here's the relevant ant target that
fails:

e -->

debuglevel=3D"lines,vars,source" source=3D"1=
.4" >

et>

Help is greatly appreciated!

Thanks,
Will
